item.description:
Hello everyone,

I want to invite you to a workshop being offered by Reverend Gabrielle entitled The Mystical Rose ~ Mary Sophia at the Roslindale Yoga Studio this Saturday evening, details are below. Please come and join us.

Shakur


Many are searching for the Divine Feminine. Come explore and experience the Mystical Rose ~ Mary Sophia, the blessed Mother Mary, and the inner workings of the feminine in a perfected example of one who followed the mystical path, and who through love and pain conquered earthly suffering for Divine Love, and came to embody wisdon and serve as the Mother of all.
item.name: Workshop: The Mystical Rose ~ Mary Sophia
